metadata.name: Big Freedia, RVA.mem 2016
metadata.description:
Composition derived from three images taken at:

Big Freedia
featuring Tank and the Bangas and Deep Velvet
October 15, 2016
at Strange Matter in Richmond, VA

---

The air conditioner at Smatter was still broken and it was humid and sweaty. This show was completely packed. As short as I am, the only way I got this shot was by pressing through the crowd and standing on the stairs that lead from the floor to the stage, snapping this while she was walking through the crowd (they never had a green room) and then getting the hell out of her way. She passes through her crowds like royalty. The absolute frenzy of her fans shooting video as she walked within inches of them was electric.

---

I capture things the way I remember them: non-linear time in blurs of intense kinetic energy, sound, and emotion.

Captured here:
Elation
Frenzy
Delirium
Awe
Overwhelm

by Wesley McQuillen
